rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0504, 3818, 3850, 4412, B6003}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {AFF5040, BFF5040}

description: This unit is intended to consolidate and apply the technical learning achieved in the core units of the Master of Applied Finance, to attain real industry experiences. This will be achieved by using a selection of targeted case studies that highlight the issues likely to be encountered in industry.
